name: vib-html5
description:
Vib-Ribbon is a rhythm game in which players guide the main character, Vibri, across a line filled with obstacles tied in correspondence to the beat of the song

--- Instructions --- Avoid the obstacles that come at you, make 5 mistakes and its game over, wait 21 seconds to fix one. Press D for blocks. Press F for loops. Press K for pits. Press L for waves.
